column5: Does anyone know who the outfitter is for Joyce Lake and how to contact them?  It used to be Booi's, but I don't think it is anymore.
Seems to be the same owner . They are on FB and Twit  https://ontariofishing.com/Boois-Fly-In-Lodge-and-Outpost/
Pretty sure this is outdated.  The cabin they describe was replaced years ago.
Ask and you shall receive...  https://fishwildeyes.com/packages
